column4: hi guys! I remember there was a program that records your monitor.. what was it called? )
you mean a program to record the desktop? I think it was gtk-recordmydesktop
well istanbul does exist, but latest news from it dates from 2007...
I see =) well thanks, I've already got recordmyvideo.. and this is the one I used to have actually, so I've got some experience with it =)
